description:
Vovsoft PDF Reader is a lightweight super-simple PDF viewer application. No complicated configuration is needed to view your PDF files from your desktop or laptop computer. The interface is minimalistic, it provides all the essentials.

Vovsoft PDF Reader is a lightweight super-simple PDF viewer application. No complicated configuration is needed to view your PDF files from your desktop or laptop computer. The interface is minimalistic, it provides all the essentials.

Experience the convenience of an efficient PDF reader designed to prioritize user experience without taxing your system's resources. This lite PDF viewer application comes with basic navigation features, enabling seamless page browsing. It provides search functionality, allowing you to find and highlight keywords in a PDF file.
With a few clicks, you can view documents in full screen mode, two page mode, rotate, zoom or scale.
Additionally, you can fill out PDF forms and save them as new PDF files.
Vovsoft PDF Reader also supports many command line options.

Key Features:
* Highlights selected text
* Supports annotations
* Remembers last read pages
* Remembers recent PDF files
* Google selected text
* Full screen
* Supports attachments
* Supports forms
* Supports password protected PDF files
* Supports exporting to image (PNG, JPG, TIF, GIF, BMP)
* Speak selected text (text to speech)
* 2-page mode
